definition: the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: As a kind of typical phonetic language, English is rich in musical and rhythmical features.
sentences.chinese: 英語作爲表音語言，富有音樂性及韻律感。

sentences.english: It is important to recognize the prosodic phrase breaks in text-to-speech.
sentences.chinese: 句子的韻律短語識別是語音合成的重要研究內容。

sentences.english: It has its own  rhythm and beat, its internal cycles of growth and  decay.
sentences.chinese: 人生自有其韻律和節奏，自有內在的生成與衰亡。

sentences.english: I love Mozart's melody; I love Markov Process.
sentences.chinese: 吾愛莫扎特之韻律，吾亦愛馬爾可夫過程。

sentences.english: The present paper review the use of prosodic information in disambiguating syntactic structure in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了近年來韻律句法解歧方面的一些研究。

sentences.english: Walking gives you ideas, unblocks blockages, sets up rhythms in your head.
sentences.chinese: 步行給你靈感，排除阻礙，在你腦海中設置韻律。

sentences.english: Angel or siren, rhythm, fragrance, light.
sentences.chinese: 天使或妖婦，韻律，芳香，光線。

sentences.english: The scenes open with a kind of rhythmed dialogue which gradually rises into song.
sentences.chinese: 各場戲以一種有韻律的對白開始，再逐漸變成歌唱。

sentences.english: I love Mozart 's melo zdy; I love Markov Process.
sentences.chinese: 吾愛莫扎特之韻律，吾亦愛馬爾可夫過程。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the prosodic structure prediction model.
sentences.chinese: 本文重點研究了韻律結構預測模型。

sentences.english: ToBI (Tones and Break Indices) is currently a widely-used prosodic labeling system.
sentences.chinese: 是目前國際上較爲流行的韻律標註體系。

sentences.english: First, it described three models related to prosody generation.
sentences.chinese: 首先描述了韻律生成的相關模型。

sentences.english: Sentences vary, the cadence isn't too long, nor too short.
sentences.chinese: 句子要有變化，韻律不宜過長，也不宜過短。

sentences.english: Whole space inside accumulate the rise and fall in scale relation is worn metrical .
sentences.chinese: 整個空間就在內蘊的比例關係裏起落着韻律。

sentences.english: To approach this, you'll need to know a little bit about meter.
sentences.chinese: 爲了達到這個你需要稍微瞭解一下韻律。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom)/fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc/natural and unforced
